name: Whisper of Wind
text:
Break: Search for a [Spell:Chant] or [Spell:Chant-Instant] from your main deck, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
Search for a [Spell:Chant] or [Spell:Chant-Instant] from your main deck, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
